about_the_game:
Game Strategy


The game is a bit difficult at the beginning, try not to conflict with animals at the beginning, try to get plant fruits first, whenever you get hurt, you should prioritize the use of fruits to increase blood, the game has a large number of level 1 plants, they will not attack the player but produce fruits, the higher the level of the plant, the more unpredictable the attack, the more the fruits obtained to the player's enhancement, when the player scavenges the fruits of a region of plants to enhance themselves with the permanent properties of fruits. When the player has finished scavenging an area for plant fruits, he will use the permanent attributes of the fruits to improve himself, and use the temporary various attributes to kill the enemies, obtain gold coins, and buy weapons as well as higher level fruits, which is a positive cycle.


Under normal circumstances, the player scavenges a region of the fruit, basically can make the player's permanent life value increased by 5 times, the player's attack power and blood-sucking ability to increase a few times ranging from the other attributes have been improved, can temporarily increase the life value is up to several tens of thousands, this time the player is considered to be the real beginning of the game's fighting, the subsequent players will encounter more attacks are not sure, uncertainty about the look of the plants and animals, which is the fun of the game! This is where the fun of the game lies.
The game also has a lot of tips for players to explore:
For example, 1: Attribute override, the game attributes are mutual override, if the player is negative high attribute attack, you can use the low attribute fruit to cover, so that the high attribute is reduced to a low attribute, the cost is the negative attribute of the maintenance of the time becomes longer. It should be noted that temporary attributes are not saved in the archive, and once you exit the current game, both positive and negative attributes will be zeroed out.
Example 2: Use a high blood-sucking fruit, then find a place with a large number of minions and utilize the blood-sucking to quickly regain blood.
For example 3: Players prioritize running the map, first get the fruit that is easy to obtain from plant bosses, then use this fruit to improve themselves, generally a kind of plant boss corresponds to a kind of attribute of a significant increase, this is also the benefits I provide for players.
For example 4: Players start with a slow defense, so defense is more difficult, for slow reaction players can move quickly instead of defending, and when the later use of the fruit to enhance the defense attributes, you can easily defend most of the animals and plants attack.
For example, 5: about how to defeat the boss, the boss often comes with very high attribute bonus, so players should prepare a large number of low-level attributes to complete the attribute coverage work when fighting with the boss, in addition, players should prepare a large number of long-distance attacks to cope with the final closing work on the boss.


Game Description.


This is a pixelated open world, fantasy, and casual action game that tells the story of what happens in a continent ringed by the sea. In the story, our protagonist gains information by defeating monsters and unlocking elite monsters to learn about the history and culture of the continent, and gradually learns the truth about the demonic infection. The story is told from the perspective of the seven betrayers, and the player defeats them through battle and leaves the continent for a new world after learning the truth.


Game Features


The game contains more than one hundred kinds of plants and more than one hundred kinds of animals, as well as more than one hundred kinds of fruits, animals and plants and fruits are all fantasy, their appearance and attack methods are different, most of the time there will be a surprise attack, this game is very test of the player's reaction and operation, the player can avoid the attack of the plants to get fruits to improve their own attributes, kill animals to get Gold coins to buy new weapons and so on.


Game Plot


The plot of the game is very interesting, the plot from the perspective of seven different characters, elaborating the landscape and customs of this fantasy world, as well as the truth of a story. These seven objects are of different races, classes, cultures, etc., so the final choices and endings are also different.

In the end, we look forward to the players' favorites.
